response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Maximum Sum of Subarray\", \"description\": \"Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of a subarray within it.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of a subarray.\\n\", \"code\": \"def max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n    max_sum = float('-inf')\\n    current_sum = 0\\n    for num in arr:\\n        current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)\\n        if current_sum > max_sum:\\n            max_sum = current_sum\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2,1,-3,4,-1,2,1,-5,4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([1, -2, 3, 10, -4, 7, 2, -5]) == 12\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([-1, -2, -3, -4, -5]) == -1\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([0, 0, 0]) == 0\"] }"
